children.name: a
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: all
children.sourceText: Thy hand shall be lifted up upon thine adversaries, and all thine enemies shall be cut off.

children.name: among
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: and
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: as
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: can
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: down
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: for
children.sourceText: For I will make my people with whom the Father hath covenanted, yea, I will make thy horn iron, and I will make thy hoofs brass.

children.name: he
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: his
children.sourceText: And I will gather my people together as a man gathereth his sheaves into the floor.

children.name: I
children.sourceText: And I will gather my people together as a man gathereth his sheaves into the floor.

children.name: if
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: in
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: into
children.sourceText: And I will gather my people together as a man gathereth his sheaves into the floor.

children.name: it
children.sourceText: And behold, I am he who doeth it.

children.name: many
children.sourceText: And thou shalt beat in pieces many people; and I will consecrate their gain unto the Lord, and their substance unto the Lord of the whole earth.

children.name: my
children.sourceText: And I will gather my people together as a man gathereth his sheaves into the floor.

children.name: none
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: of
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: off
children.sourceText: Thy hand shall be lifted up upon thine adversaries, and all thine enemies shall be cut off.

children.name: out
children.sourceText: for it shall come to pass in that day, that I will cut off thy horses out of the midst of thee, and I will destroy thy chariots; And I will cut off the cities of thy land, and throw down all thy strongholds; And I will cut off witchcrafts out of thy land, and thou shalt have no more soothsayers; Thy graven images I will also cut off, and thy standing images out of the midst of thee, and thou shalt no more worship the works of thy hands; And I will pluck up thy groves out of the midst of thee; so will I destroy thy cities.

children.name: shall
children.sourceText: Thy hand shall be lifted up upon thine adversaries, and all thine enemies shall be cut off.

children.name: so
children.sourceText: for it shall come to pass in that day, that I will cut off thy horses out of the midst of thee, and I will destroy thy chariots; And I will cut off the cities of thy land, and throw down all thy strongholds; And I will cut off witchcrafts out of thy land, and thou shalt have no more soothsayers; Thy graven images I will also cut off, and thy standing images out of the midst of thee, and thou shalt no more worship the works of thy hands; And I will pluck up thy groves out of the midst of thee; so will I destroy thy cities.

children.name: such
children.sourceText: And I will execute vengeance and fury upon them, even as upon the heathen, such as they have not heard.

children.name: that
children.sourceText: for it shall come to pass in that day, that I will cut off thy horses out of the midst of thee, and I will destroy thy chariots; And I will cut off the cities of thy land, and throw down all thy strongholds; And I will cut off witchcrafts out of thy land, and thou shalt have no more soothsayers; Thy graven images I will also cut off, and thy standing images out of the midst of thee, and thou shalt no more worship the works of thy hands; And I will pluck up thy groves out of the midst of thee; so will I destroy thy cities.

children.name: the
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: thee
children.sourceText: for it shall come to pass in that day, that I will cut off thy horses out of the midst of thee, and I will destroy thy chariots; And I will cut off the cities of thy land, and throw down all thy strongholds; And I will cut off witchcrafts out of thy land, and thou shalt have no more soothsayers; Thy graven images I will also cut off, and thy standing images out of the midst of thee, and thou shalt no more worship the works of thy hands; And I will pluck up thy groves out of the midst of thee; so will I destroy thy cities.

children.name: their
children.sourceText: And thou shalt beat in pieces many people; and I will consecrate their gain unto the Lord, and their substance unto the Lord of the whole earth.

children.name: them
children.sourceText: remnant of Jacob shall be among the Gentiles, yea, in the midst of them as a lion among the beasts of the forest, as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he go through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: they
children.sourceText: And I will execute vengeance and fury upon them, even as upon the heathen, such as they have not heard.

children.name: thine
children.sourceText: Thy hand shall be lifted up upon thine adversaries, and all thine enemies shall be cut off.

children.name: thou
children.sourceText: And thou shalt beat in pieces many people; and I will consecrate their gain unto the Lord, and their substance unto the Lord of the whole earth.

children.name: through
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: thy
children.sourceText: Thy hand shall be lifted up upon thine adversaries, and all thine enemies shall be cut off.

children.name: unto
children.sourceText: And thou shalt beat in pieces many people; and I will consecrate their gain unto the Lord, and their substance unto the Lord of the whole earth.

children.name: up
children.sourceText: Thy hand shall be lifted up upon thine adversaries, and all thine enemies shall be cut off.

children.name: upon

children.name: who
children.sourceText: as a lion among the beasts of the forest, and as a young lion among the flocks of sheep, who, if he goeth through both treadeth down and teareth in pieces, and none can deliver.

children.name: whom
children.sourceText: For I will make my people with whom the Father hath covenanted, yea, I will make thy horn iron, and I will make thy hoofs brass.

children.name: will

children.name: with
children.sourceText: For I will make my people with whom the Father hath covenanted, yea, I will make thy horn iron, and I will make thy hoofs brass.
